definition: source (esp. of quotation or literary allusion)/origin/where sth comes from

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: The answers to difficult problems are usually not found in the same place as the problems.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能在問題的出處找到解決疑難問題的方法。

sentences.english: would not have checked the provenance of that story?
sentences.chinese: 沒有核查那個故事的出處。

sentences.english: But did not make clear provenance and author full name in any place.
sentences.chinese: 但沒有在任何一個地方表明出處和作者姓名。

sentences.english: But Song Yu's contribution to the motif history …
sentences.chinese: 而宋玉在出處仕隱主題史上的歷史貢獻，由此奠定。

sentences.english: Tanslated by Zhu Xiaoxing. Whoever wants to quote it should note the translator and where the translation is from.
sentences.chinese: 本文由朱曉星譯出，如要轉引，請註明譯者及出處。

sentences.english: It differs from reprinted publication in that a reprint cites sources.
sentences.chinese: 與單行本出版物的不同之處在於再版引用出處。

sentences.english: But Song Yu's contribution to the motif history was es…
sentences.chinese: 而宋玉在出處仕隱主題史上的歷史貢獻，由此奠定。

sentences.english: An understanding of the provenance of the product is key.
sentences.chinese: 對產品出處的瞭解很關鍵。

sentences.english: You need not note the source of information that you paraphrased.
sentences.chinese: 你沒有必要告知你所解釋的信息的出處。

sentences.english: I asked her for the provenance.
The article is original, writing is also the strength to live, reference please indicate the source and author.
sentences.chinese: 文章原創，寫作也是力氣活，引用請註明出處和作者。

sentences.english: The picture has since appeared on a host of blog sites, without attribution ⑫.
sentences.chinese: 這張圖片已在許多博客上出現，卻沒有註明出處。

sentences.english: Self-plagiarism involves copying from one's own work without proper attribution.
sentences.chinese: 自我剽竊涉及複製自己的作品而沒有正確註明出處。

sentences.english: Amorphous cloud source element may like clouds also free.
sentences.chinese: 浮雲出處元無定，得似浮雲也自由。

sentences.english: Analysis and commentary should be labeled and not misrepresent fact or context.
sentences.chinese: 分析語評論應該標明出處，以避免歪曲事實或語境。

sentences.english: Please indicate the source when you quote from my LIVE space. Thank you.
sentences.chinese: 引用本網誌內容時請您註明出處，謝謝合作。

definition: to plagiarize/to copy/to attack the flank or rear of an enemy
to mark out/to tag/to put a sign on sth explaining or calling attention to/to annotate (e.g. a character with its pinyin)
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
